title: Rogan Josh
procedure: Heat mustard oil in a pan, add asafoetida and saut√© for a few seconds.
Add onions and cook till golden brown.
Add lamb shanks and sear on high heat.
Mix in ginger garlic paste, turmeric, and chili powder.
Cook for 5 minutes, then add yogurt and mix well.
Pour in water and bring to a boil.
Lower the heat and simmer for an hour.
Sprinkle fennel powder and stir well.
Cook till the oil separates from the curry.
Garnish with coriander and serve hot.
